A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Shit\, it actually annoys me the lowest I can give it is half a star.. \nthis film is filled with huge plot holes and has an entire portion of the. Film which is irrelevant. \nGranted there were some good points in it. But as a whole the story just fell flat! So much suspense built up from the force awakens\, who is Rey?\, who is Snoke?\, where is Luke? So many questions to explore and paths to follow. But no\, the last Jedi just shits on them. Seriously what were they thinking? Rey is no one\, snoke just dies with no back story. Luke is just hiding squatting in a hut? Not training or seeking out enlightenment. Just squatting in a hut turning his back on the force...
